野球選手: (やきゅうせんしゅ) - baseball player; ballplayer
野球部: (やきゅうぶ) - baseball club (i.e. baseball team of a university, corporation, etc.)
野生動物保護団体: (やせいどうぶつほごだんたい) - wildlife protection organization (organisation)
野生化: (やせいか) - going feral (of a species); reverting to wild; escape
野生犬: (やせいいぬ) - wild dog/Asiatic jackal (Canis aureus ssp.)/golden jackal; side-striped jackal (carnivore, Canis adustus)
野生種: (やせいしゅ) - wild species (as opposed to domesticated species)
野生絶滅: (やせいぜつめつ) - extinction in the wild
野積み: (のづみ) - piled out in the open
野立て: (のだて) - open-air tea ceremony; aristocrat taking a break during a trip in a palanquin; something standing in the open
野糞: (のぐそ) - defecating outdoors; faeces lying on the ground (feces)
野締め: (のじめ) - killing one's catch on the spot (e.g. a bird); killing a fish immediately to preserve its freshness
野罌粟: (ノゲシ) - sow thistle (Sonchus oleraceus); milk thistle
野老: (トコロ) - Dioscorea tokoro (species of wild yam); (やろう only) old man living in the countryside
野老葛: (ところずら) - Dioscorea tokoro (species of wild yam)
野臥: (のぶし) - hermit/mountain ascetic/itinerant priest; mountain-dwelling robber/brigand
野臥間: (のぶすま) - legendary monster resembling a flying squirrel; (orig. meaning)  Japanese giant flying squirrel (Petaurista leucogenys); (esp. 野衾) Japanese dish prepared with cooked fish and chicken
野良: (のら) - (良 is ateji) field/farm; rural/agricultural; stray (e.g. dog, cat); unauthorised (esp. mobile phone application)
野良仕事: (のらしごと) - (yoji) farm work; field labour; field labor
野良着: (のらぎ) - clothes for doing farm work or working in fields
野芥子: (ノゲシ) - sow thistle (Sonchus oleraceus); milk thistle
野茉莉: (エゴノキ) - Japanese snowbell; styrax japonica
野草: (やそう) - wild grasses; field grass; wildflowers
野菜を作る: (やさいをつくる) - to grow vegetables
野菜一皿: (やさいひとさら) - a dish of vegetables
野菜工場: (やさいこうじょう) - vegetable plant; vegetable factory; closed growing system for year-round production of vegetables
野菜畑: (やさいばたけ) - vegetable garden; kitchen garden
野萱草: (ノカンゾウ) - day lily (Hemerocallis fulva var. distiche)
野葡萄: (のぶどう) - wild grape; wild grapevine; ampelopsis
野蒜: (のびる) - wild rocambole (edible plant, Allium grayi)
野蛮国: (やばんこく) - uncivilized country; savage land
野衾: (のぶすま) - legendary monster resembling a flying squirrel; (orig. meaning)  Japanese giant flying squirrel (Petaurista leucogenys); (esp. 野衾) Japanese dish prepared with cooked fish and chicken
野趣: (やしゅ) - rural beauty; rusticity; rustic beauty
野遊: (やゆう) - outing (e.g. flower watching, hunting, picking wildflowers); excursion
野遊山: (のゆさん) - outing to the fields and mountains
野郎: (yarou) - cara, amigo, colega, parceiro, cara, amigo, colega, parceiro; bastardo, idiota, canalha, filho da puta
野鄙: (やひ) - vulgar; mean; base; coarse; crude
野雁: (ノガン) - bustard (esp. the great bustard, Otis tarda)
野面: (のづら) - (surface of) field/plain; unworked surface of (quarried) stone/(rough) surface of plank
野面石: (のづらいし) - quarry stone; unprocessed stone
野音: (やおん) - (esp. Hibiya Open-Air Concert Hall in Tokyo)  outdoor concert hall; band shell; bandstand
野鳥観察: (やちょうかんさつ) - birdwatching; birding
量: (você/haka) - quantity , quantity, amount, volume, portion (of food)
量が増える: (りょうがふえる) - to gain in quantity
量より質: (りょうよりしつ) - quality before quantity
量り売り: (はかりうり) - selling by measure; selling by weight; selling by volume
量る: (はかる) - to measure/to weigh/to survey/to time (sound, gauge, estimate); to conjecture/to infer/to surmise
量刑: (りょうけい) - judge's sentence; assessment of a case
量子エレクトロニクス: (りょうしエレクトロニクス) - quantum electronics
量子コンピュータ: (りょうしコンピュータ) - quantum computer
